content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
They just reopened after few months of closure! Missed this place and I'm happy they are back on their business. Great place to hang out with few drinks or to have dinner ! Highly recommend their food. They also have many promotions going on with their reopening so you should check their instagram @jail.joa to take advantage of it ;)
